title: Leafy Greens Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Organic, Western, Buffet, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Catering
description: Vegan food cafe and health shop/deli situated on an organic farm outside of the city and shares the premises with the Casalinga Restaurant. Offers buffet plus juices, wheatgrass, smoothies, raw cake, and raw chocolate. Sells honey, fresh organic produce from its garden, but otherwise all vegan.
streetAddress: Plot 328 Rocky Ridge Rd, Muldersdrift, Gauteng
